statements: UPDATE social_media_engagement_metrics SET likes = 100 WHERE username = 'user123';
UPDATE social_media_engagement_metrics SET comments = 50, shares = 20 WHERE post_id = 101;
UPDATE social_media_engagement_metrics SET likes = 100, shares = 50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE social_media_engagement_metrics SET comments = 25, shares = 10, likes = 75 WHERE username = 'newuser';
UPDATE customer_sentiment_metrics SET sentiment_score = 8.5, engagement_level = 3 WHERE customer_id = 101
UPDATE social_media_engagement SET shares = 100, likes = 150, engagement_rate = 3.25 WHERE platform = 'Twitter'
UPDATE customer_sentiment_metrics SET sentiment_score = 8.7 WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE social_media_engagement SET comments = 50, likes = 100, engagement_rate = 3.85 WHERE post_id = 202;
UPDATE SocialMediaPosts SET likes_count = 100 WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE SocialMediaPosts SET shares_count = 50, post_content = 'New post content' WHERE post_id = 2;
UPDATE SocialMediaPosts SET likes_count = likes_count + 1, shares_count = shares_count - 1 WHERE post_id = 123456
UPDATE SocialMediaPosts SET post_content = 'New Post Content', post_date = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE post_id = 987654
UPDATE social_media_accounts SET followers_count = 5000, account_name = 'New Name' WHERE account_id = 1;
UPDATE posts SET likes_count = 100, shares_count = 50 WHERE post_id = 3;
UPDATE social_media_accounts SET followers_count = followers_count + 100, engagement_rate = 4.5 WHERE account_id = 1;
UPDATE posts SET likes_count = 200, shares_count = shares_count + 50 WHERE account_id = 3 AND post_id = 5;
UPDATE SocialMediaPosts SET post_content = 'New updated post content' WHERE post_id = 123;
UPDATE PostReactions SET reaction_type = 'Love' WHERE user_id = 456 AND post_id = 789;
UPDATE SocialMediaPosts SET post_content = 'New post content', post_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE UserProfiles SET email = 'new.email@example.com', join_date = '2022-09-01' WHERE user_id = 1;
